es.eurohelp.lod.aldapa.storage

Class TestsMemoryRDFStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.eurohelp.lod.aldapa.storage.TestsMemoryRDFStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RDFStore

    public class TestsMemoryRDFStore
extends Object
implements RDFStore
    A simple memory store that does not persist data, based on RDF4J, for testing purposes. To persist data, use flushGraph.
    Author:
    Mikel Egana Aranguren, Eurohelp Consulting S.L.

      Executes a SPARQL query that will return, if successful, a set of RDF statements and their Graph (context), if any

      Executes a SPARQL query that will return, if successful, a set of bindings (results as variables and associated entities)

      Executes a SPARQL query that will modify a graph: DELETE, DELETE DATA, INSERT, INSERT DATA
